SKT_FIRST.name: Sardines for Dinner!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Aye Aye, Captain!</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>준비 됐나? 네, 선장님!</color> 스킬의 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>の確率で\n<color=#28d9ed>【準備はいいか? はい、船長!】</color>のスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。

SKT_SECOND.name: Savory Squid!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies.\nIf this attack kills an enemy, this skill will not have a cooldown.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n이 스킬로 적을 처치하면 스킬의 쿨타임이 발생하지 않습니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルで敵を倒した時、スキルターンが初期化する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Aye Aye, Captain!
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: 準備はいいか? はい、船長!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color> after using the skill.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Action Points.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: When using a skill after attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Aye Aye, Captain!</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 AP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 스킬 사용 시 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>준비 됐나? 네, 선장님!</color> 스킬의 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp:
<color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、APを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。

<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後スキル使用時、<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【準備はいいか? はい、船長!】
</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。
